thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Serenades John Legend with “Ordinary People” for Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Serenades John Legend with “Ordinary People” for Valentine’s Day

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Chrissy Teigen Serenades John Legend with “Ordinary People” for Valentine’s Day
text:
LOVE magazine has shared a special Valentine’s Day film directed by Rankin, featuring celebrity couple Chrissy Teigen and John Legend singing “Ordinary People.”
Model Chrissy Teigen stars in the video wearing lingerie by Agent Provocateur, alongside pieces by Marc Jacobs, Moschino, and more. Meanwhile Legend, the multi Grammy Award-winning singer/songwriter, looks on adoringly, unable to resist joining in for the track’s emotional climax.
In case you weren’t already excited for Valentine’s Day, here’s something to look forward to…⠀ @chrissyteigen by @rankinarchive fashion editor @seanknight make up @patrickta hair @giannandreahair ❤️❤️❤️❤️ 
A post shared by LOVE MAGAZINE (@thelovemagazine) on Feb 13, 2017 at 8:30am PST 

“I love ‘Ordinary People’ so much, so when Katie (the film’s producer) asked me to shoot Chrissy for Valentine’s, the idea of her doing a lip-sync version immediately jumped into my head,” Rankin said. “Then when Chrissy came up with the idea on set, and with John, I was like, erm, yes please! When they sang it together at the end, I got goose bumps.”
Watch the full video above, then check out Bella Hadid’s stunning Valentine’s Day shoot .
